title: Using Synthetic Division
text: Observe that the remainder is zero, so $$x+2$$ is a factor of the polynomial. The quotient is $$x^2-8x$$ + $$15$$. Thus, we can use the Division Algorithm to write the polynomial as the product of the divisor and the quotient $$\left(x+2\right) \left(x^2-8x+15\right)$$.\n##figure1.gif##
